page.title: 13Clerk to the Parish Council
page.content: Mr.Barrell lives down Sea Lane.He was a policeman for 30 years so he knows about the law and can advise the parish councillors on legal matters. He works in Council Offices near the bus station on Skegness Road.He has a secretary in training to take his place when he is ill or retires. He carries out decisions of the councillors so he is really the village manager.His work includes everything from balancing the books to choosing which type of disinfectant to use in the public toilets.Ingoldmells is one of the few parish councils owning the beach and foreshore within its boundary.In addition it owns a caravan site,2 holiday flats,several shops and a bus station amongst other things.To run these concerns he has 17 staff in summer and 7 in winter so consequently he is a very busy man.
